ref: 534 abhihāra m. ʻ bringing near ʼ Pat., ʻ *offering ʼ. [Cf. abhíharati ʻ brings, offers ʼ ŚBr., Pk. ahiharaï ʻ takes, raises ʼ: √hr̥]

lang: Aśokan, i.e. the language of the Inscriptions of Aśoka

ref: M. āher, ah˚ m. ʻ presents from friends and relatives to one in whose family there is a marriage ʼ.
